New in this release

There are improvements in each of the major development tools.

We've also fixed many problems. See section Problems fixed in this release, for a list of bugfixes.

  • Platforms: Changes to supported platforms
  • HPUX: HPUX support
  • gplus: What's new with G++
  • gdb: What's new with GDB
